comment: No one should be surprised that the Democrats are so determined to import hordes of low-IQ Spanish-speaking peasants from Latin America to displace working-class whites. If only white Americans voted, the Democrats would never win another national election.

(m / multi-sentence

            :ARG1 (s / surprise-01
                  :ARG0 (d / determined-02
                        :ARG0 (p / person
                              :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91

                                          :name (n / name
                                                :op1 "Democrat"
                                                :op2 "Party"))))

                                    :ARG0-of (s2 / speak-01

                                                :name (n2 / name
                                                      :op1 "Spanish")))
                                    :quant (h2 / horde))
                              :ARG2 (w / world-region
                                    :name (n3 / name
                                          :op1 "Latin"
                                          :op2 "America"))
                              :purpose (d2 / displace-01
                                    :ARG0 p3
                                    :ARG1 (p4 / person
                                          :ARG1-of (w2 / white-02)
                                          :mod (c / class
                                                :ARG0-of (w3 / work-01)))))
                        :degree (s3 / so))
                  :ARG1 (n4 / no-one)))
      :snt2 (w4 / win-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 (p5 / person
                  :ARG0-of (h3 / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG1 p2
                        :name (n5 / name
                              :op1 "Republican"
                              :op2 "Party"))))
      :ARG1 (e / elect-01
            :mod (n6 / nation)
            :mod (a / another))
      :time (e2 / ever)
      :condition (v / vote-01
            :ARG0 (p6 / person
                  :ARG1-of (w5 / white-02)
                  :mod (o / only))))
